input.sentences: these were some photos from a motorcycle get together held in the city .
there were so many different types of bikes to see .
it was hard to choose my favorite . everyone is having fun chatting .
these guys look eager to go . they were very funny i remember .
they even let me take their picture . say cheese !
output.sentences: This weekend I took photos of the annual motorcycle gathering.
There were hundreds of different types of bikes.
It was hard for me to choose my favorite bike.
I ran into some guys I met at the event last year because they were so funny!
I asked them to gather round and say "CHEEESE!"
